channel.title: CiTR -- Nardwuar The Human Serviette Presents
channel.description: Join Nardwuar the Human Serviette for an hour and a half of Manhattan Clam Chowder flavoured entertainment. Doot doola doot doo ... doot doo!
channel.itunes:summary: Join Nardwuar the Human Serviette for an hour and a half of Manhattan Clam Chowder flavoured entertainment. Doot doola doot doo ... doot doo!
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Doot doola doot doo ... doot doo!
